intros: Pouring a 'Bleeding Jane' for this one...
Heartbreak is common in Glitch City, but...
Let me consult the romance novels...
Love is just a chemical reaction, however...
answers: they are definitely not into you.
outros: Drinks are on you if it works out.
I'd offer advice, but I'm just a bartender.

intros: Checking your credit rating...
The economy is trash, and...
According to the bank accounts...
Money makes the world go round, and...
answers: you should probably ask for a raise.
outros: Don't spend it all in one place.

intros: Checking the RNG gods...
I've seen better odds on a coin flip, but...
Booting up the simulation...
Calculated risk assessment says...
answers: RNG is not on your side.
you will pull a 3-star trash item.
your luck is peaking right now.
don't bet your savings on it.

intros: Staring into the abyss...
That's a heavy question for a Tuesday...
Let me pour a strong one first...
Checking my core programming...
answers: we are all just code in the end.
try not to think about it too much.
outros: Existential dread is on the house.

intros: Running diagnostics...
Have you tried turning it off and on again?
Checking the server logs...
Scanning for viruses...
answers: it's a feature, not a bug.
it will work on the first try.

intros: Checking the fridge...
The chef is grumpy, but...
If you're asking for my recommendation...
My sensors detect hunger...
Sharpening the knives...
I don't allow brawls in the bar, but...
Assessing threat level...
Violence is rarely the answer, however...
answers: they aren't worth the jail time.
outros: I'll call the cops if you start something.

intros: Consulting the mixing glass...
I don't usually do fortune telling, but...
Let's see what the cards say...
Honestly?
Looking at the sediment in this glass...
I asked Fore (the cat), and he thinks...
My intuition is usually expensive, but...
Let me wipe this glass and think...
If I had a credit for every time I heard that...
The ice is melting, and it says...
Let me check the security feed...
answers: the odds are in your favor.
ask me again after you buy a drink.
I'd bet my tips on it.
outros: Time to mix drinks and change lives.
Now, what can I get you?
You didn't hear it from me.
Don't blame me if it goes wrong.
Can we talk about something else?
